text: Telekom Electronic Beats (TEB) is an international music marketing program launched by Deutsche Telekom AG in 2000, focusing on electronic music and club culture. It organizes events such as concerts, festivals, and club nights across Europe. TEB's media portfolio includes "Electronic Beats TV," a long- running video magazine that transitioned to a quarterly DVD called Slices and now hosts content on YouTube. They also have an online magazine called .net, which covers electronic dance music and club culture. TEB had a print publication called Electronic Beats Magazine until 2015. They have also ventured into record label collaborations and launched the app "The Lenz" with Gorillaz in 2017. == References == Category:Technology companies of Germany
title: Telekom Electronic Beats
